headline: FIS, Circle Partner to Offer Stablecoin Transactions to Financial Institutions
summary: Through this partnership, the companies will let U.S. financial institutions offer their customers the option to make stablecoin payments in USDC, which is redeemable 1:1 in U.S. dollars.
